name: Kin Song
description:
Swim with WASD or the arrow keys to find your four lost children. Use the Spacebar to shoot a sonar blast to drive away the squid keeping you away from your mate in the center of the ocean. With all of your children in tow, you may just be able to reunite your family.

(MICA Game Lab - Global Game Jam 2021)
